metadata.title: CVE-2016-6171 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Knot DNS before 2.3.0 allows remote DNS servers to cause a denial of service (memory exhaustion and slave server crash) via a large zone transfer for (1) DDNS, (2) AXFR, or (3) IXFR.

criterions.comment: knot package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-1').
